articles.title: Huawei FreeBuds 4i with ANC, 10 hours continuous playback launched in China - gizmochina
articles.description: Huawei has quietly launched the FreeBuds 4i  in China. The product is presently listed on Huawei’s official website and is on preorder on the company’s online store – Vmall. It carries a price tag of 499 yuan (~$76). The Huawei FreeBuds 4i is the successor to…
